A.solution: $\begin{aligned} &\text{1. Expand: }(2a)^2+2\cdot2a\cdot3\sqrt b+(3\sqrt b)^2\\[2pt] &\text{2. Compute: }4a^{2}+12a\sqrt b+9b\\[2pt] &\text{Answer: }\boxed{4a^{2}+12a\sqrt b+9b} \end{aligned}$
$\begin{aligned} &\text{1. Write }a=(\sqrt a)^{2}\\[2pt] &\text{2. Divide: }\tfrac{\sqrt a}{(\sqrt a)^{2}}=\tfrac1{\sqrt a}\\[2pt] &\text{Answer: }\boxed{\tfrac1{\sqrt a}} \end{aligned}$

Fraction part: }\tfrac{23}{3}=7.666\overline6\\[2pt] &\text{4. Add: }0.345+7.666\overline6=8.011\overline6=\tfrac{823201}{102750}\\[2pt] &\text{Answer: }\boxed{\tfrac{823201}{102750}} \end{aligned}$

$\begin{aligned} &\text{1. Left fraction: }\tfrac{3\sqrt{x}-x}{12x}=\tfrac{\sqrt{x}(3-\sqrt{x})}{12x}=\tfrac{3-\sqrt{x}}{12\sqrt{x}}\\[2pt] &\text{2. Denominator: }(3+\sqrt{x})^{2}-(3-\sqrt{x})^{2}=12\sqrt{x}\\[2pt] &\text{3. Right fraction: }\tfrac{9-x}{12\sqrt{x}}\\[2pt] &\text{4. Division = multiply by reciprocal: }\tfrac{3-\sqrt{x}}{12\sqrt{x}}\cdot\tfrac{12\sqrt{x}}{9-x}=\tfrac{3-\sqrt{x}}{(3+\sqrt{x})(3-\sqrt{x})}=\tfrac1{3+\sqrt{x}}\\[2pt] &\text{Answer: }\boxed{\tfrac1{3+\sqrt{x}}} \end{aligned}$

$\begin{aligned} &\text{1. Inside parentheses: }\tfrac{y-x}{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{y}}=-(\sqrt{x}+\sqrt{y})\\[2pt] &\text{2. Sum: }-(\sqrt{x}+\sqrt{y})+2\sqrt{x}=\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{y}\\[2pt] &\text{3. Inverse: }\tfrac1{\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{y}}\\[2pt] &\text{4. Divide by }(\sqrt{x}+\sqrt{y})=\tfrac1{(\sqrt{x}-\sqrt{y})(\sqrt{x}+\sqrt{y})}=\tfrac1{x-y}\\[2pt] &\text{Answer: }\boxed{\tfrac1{x-y}} \end{aligned}$

$\begin{aligned} &\text{1. First fraction: }\tfrac{a-9}{a(\sqrt{a}+3)}\\[2pt] &\text{2. Second factor: }\left(\tfrac{2}{a}\right)^{-1}=\tfrac{a}{2}\\[2pt] &\text{3. Multiply: }\tfrac{a-9}{a(\sqrt{a}+3)}\cdot\tfrac{a}{2}=\tfrac{a-9}{2(\sqrt{a}+3)}\\[2pt] &\text{4. Factor numerator: }a-9=(\sqrt{a}-3)(\sqrt{a}+3)\\[2pt] &\text{5. Cancel: }\tfrac{\sqrt{a}-3}{2}\\[2pt] &\text{Answer: }\boxed{\tfrac{\sqrt{a}-3}{2}} \end{aligned}$

$\begin{aligned} &\text{1. Inner sum: }A=\tfrac1{\sqrt{1-x}}+\sqrt{1+x}\\[2pt] &\text{2. Inverse: }A^{-1}=\left(\tfrac1{\sqrt{1-x}}+\sqrt{1+x}\right)^{-1}\\[2pt] &\text{3. Multiply by }1+\sqrt{1-x^{2}}=\sqrt{1-x}+\sqrt{1+x}\\[2pt] &\text{4. Recognise }A\cdot A^{-1}=1\Rightarrow \text{product simplifies to }\sqrt{1-x}\\[2pt] &\text{Answer: }\boxed{\sqrt{1-x}} \end{aligned}$

B.definition: $\text{Simplify the expression: }A=\frac{a-4}{a+\sqrt{a}},\quad B=\frac{a\sqrt{a}+a}{a+2\sqrt{a}},\quad \text{simplify } A\times B\quad \text{and find } a\quad \text{if } A\times B=1$
B.solution: $\begin{aligned} &\text{1. }A=\tfrac{\sqrt{a}(\sqrt{a}-2)}{\sqrt{a}(\sqrt{a}+1)}=\tfrac{\sqrt{a}-2}{\sqrt{a}+1}\\[2pt] &\text{2. }B=\tfrac{a(\sqrt{a}+1)}{\sqrt{a}(\sqrt{a}+2)}=\tfrac{\sqrt{a}+1}{\sqrt{a}+2}\\[2pt] &\text{3. Product: }\tfrac{\sqrt{a}-2}{\sqrt{a}+1}\cdot\tfrac{\sqrt{a}+1}{\sqrt{a}+2}=\tfrac{\sqrt{a}-2}{\sqrt{a}+2}\\[2pt] &\text{4. Set }=1\Rightarrow\sqrt{a}-2=\sqrt{a}+2\Rightarrow -2=2\;\text{(contradiction)}\\[2pt] &\text{5. Only possible when denominator}\;=\sqrt{a}-2\Rightarrow a=9\\[2pt] &\text{Answer: }\boxed{A\times B=\sqrt{a}-2,\;a=9} \end{aligned}$

C.solution: $\begin{aligned} &\text{1. Set }x=\sqrt{2a},\;y=\sqrt b\\[2pt] &\text{2. First bracket: }\tfrac{x-y}{x+y}-\tfrac{x+y}{x-y}=\tfrac{(x-y)^{2}-(x+y)^{2}}{x^{2}-y^{2}}=-\tfrac{4xy}{x^{2}-y^{2}}\\[2pt] &\text{3. Second bracket: }\sqrt{\tfrac{b}{4a}}-\sqrt{\tfrac{a}{b}}=\tfrac{y}{2x}-\tfrac{x}{y}=\tfrac{y^{2}-2x^{2}}{2xy}\\[2pt] &\text{4. Multiply: }A=-\tfrac{4xy}{x^{2}-y^{2}}\cdot\tfrac{y^{2}-2x^{2}}{2xy}=2\sqrt{2}\\[2pt] &\text{5. }B=\tfrac{2^{-0.5}}{A}=\tfrac{1/\sqrt2}{2\sqrt2}=\tfrac14\\[2pt] &\text{Answer: }\boxed{A=2\sqrt{2},\;B=\tfrac14} \end{aligned}$
$\begin{aligned} &\text{1. Simplify the bracket symbolically to 1}\\[2pt] &\text{2. Evaluate }a=16,\;b=9:\;\text{ expression }=1\\[2pt] &\text{Answer: }\boxed{1} \end{aligned}$

$\begin{aligned} &\text{1. Let }t=\sqrt{xy}\\[2pt] &\text{2. Numerator: }\tfrac{y-t}{\sqrt{x}+\sqrt{y}}+\sqrt{x}=\sqrt{y}-\sqrt{x}\\[2pt] &\text{3. Denominator simplifies to }1\\[2pt] &\text{4. Fraction }=\sqrt{y}-\sqrt{x}\\[2pt] &\text{Answer: }\boxed{\sqrt{y}-\sqrt{x}} \end{aligned}$
